CustomField.description: Used to replace 500gm with base and Incremental weights present on Opportunity
CustomField.formula: CASE( PricebookEntry.Product2.Name , "Upto 500gms", SUBSTITUTE( "Upto 500gms", "500", Text(Opportunity.Forward_Base__c) ) , "Additional 500gms",SUBSTITUTE("Additional 500gms", "500",Text(Opportunity.Forward_Incremental__c)), "DTO (500gms)", SUBSTITUTE( "DTO (500gms)", "500", Text(Opportunity.DTO_Base__c) ) ,"DTO (Additional 500gms)", SUBSTITUTE("DTO (Additional 500gms)", "500", Text(Opportunity.DTO_Incremental__c)), "RTO (Every 500gms)", SUBSTITUTE("RTO (Every 500gms)", "500", Text(Opportunity.RTO__c) ), "Additional 500gms (up to 3kgs)", SUBSTITUTE("Additional 500gms (up to 3kgs)","500", TEXT(Opportunity.Forward_Incremental__c) ), "RTO (Every 1000gms)",SUBSTITUTE("RTO (Every 1000gms)","1000", TEXT(Opportunity.RTO__c)), "DTO (Every 1000gms)",SUBSTITUTE("DTO (Every 1000gms)","1000",TEXT( Opportunity.DTO_Base__c )),"DTO (Add 1000gms)",SUBSTITUTE("DTO (Add 1000gms)","1000",TEXT( Opportunity.DTO_Incremental__c )),"DTO (1000gms)",SUBSTITUTE("DTO (1000gms)","1000",TEXT( Opportunity.DTO_Base__c )), PricebookEntry.Product2.Name)
